name: Planetary Devastation
description: Planetary Devastation is a first-person space survival game with the goal of reinvigorating your destroyed home planet. Humans and aliens lived together on earth until the great Planetary Devastation occurred. You luckily escaped with your life, but that means it is your sole duty to reinvigorate the planet you once called home with new life in the form of plants, aliens, and anything else you can get your hands on. Sustainable living!
